law.catch_line: Unrecorded deeds to be advertised by clerk.
law.text: Each county clerk shall, once in each year, at the April or May term, advertise by posting at the courthouse of his county, a list of all the deeds in his office unrecorded, and the reason why each one has not been recorded.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 512.
